meanings.sent1: She eulogizes her friend for always being kind.
meanings.sent2: The community eulogizes the brave firefighter who saved many lives.
meanings.sent3: At the party, everyone eulogizes the delicious cake.
meanings.sent4: His artwork eulogizes the beauty of nature in a unique way.
meanings.sent5: The teacher eulogizes the hardworking students during the graduation ceremony.

meanings.definition: To speak or write in praise of
meanings.sent1: He eulogizes the author's talent in storytelling.
meanings.sent2: During the memorial, people eulogize the contributions of the deceased.
meanings.sent3: The comedian eulogizes his own jokes to make the audience laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her speech eulogizes the power of unity in times of crisis.
meanings.sent5: The singer eulogizes the love between two people through her song lyrics.
